channel.title: Zetabot dead hurr durr
channel.description: Jagex are on da move again. Sent me and Zerofreeze a nice little letter about fucking off from their property! I'd say it's just a matter of time before rs cheating goes to obscure irc nets with no websites.

item.title: Zetabot dead hurr durr
item.dc:creator: @maminerr maminerr
item.description:
@maminerr wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:9, topic:337110”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=433518.msg3183159#msg3183159 date=1271510034]
how do you get closed down when you havent done anything
[/quote]Somehow they have retrieved evidence about it. I don’t really care that much though, rs cheating scene is a shithole and i’m more interested in exploring other areas of programming, such as indie game development.[/quote]
when i was 13 they told me they had evidence of me buying gold online.
i’ve never botted, let alone bought gold off a website. when they say they have proof, its a retarded excuse to make you stop doing something or piss you off.

Read full topic

Considering the situation Qauters ended up in, i did the right thing. I do not have the luxury of money to waste away on courts.

item.title: Zetabot dead hurr durr
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Yz85Racer:

What exactly did Quarters end up getting? I never found out, last I heard he was in a lot of shit.

Maybe registered mail, maybe even a summons to an appropriate court (Jagex do have the money to pursue people who undermine their rights, even if they do reside in a country other than Britain). I can’t remember the full story, but he went and created a Chinese alter-ego to keep the project alive (and his pockets lined).

Read full topic

item.title: Zetabot dead hurr durr
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:14, topic:337110”][quote author=la­wl link=topic=433518.msg3183897#msg3183897 date=1271554515]

how do you get closed down when you havent done anything
[/quote]Somehow they have retrieved evidence about it. I don’t really care that much though, rs cheating scene is a shithole and i’m more interested in exploring other areas of programming, such as indie game development.

Evidence about what? It isn’t illegal to mess with the client for educational purposes and for no profit, so what could they possibly have on you? Shutting down on the first letter is a dumb move anyhow, not only is there no reason for you to shut down, but it also makes it seem like you are doing something wrong. (unless you were doing something blatantly wrong, I don’t know how you did things)

apparently he had a lawyer come to his door to make him sign something to never do rs cheating shit again

If he signed it he is a complete idiot.[/quote]
not really, its evident that he was completely bored of making the bot

Read full topic

Shutting down on the first letter is a dumb move anyhow, not only is there no reason for you to shut down, but it also makes it seem like you are doing something wrong. (unless you were doing something blatantly wrong, I don’t know how you did things)

apparently he had a lawyer come to his door to make him sign something to never do rs cheating shit again[/quote]
